This is a cooperation ninjutsu where one [[Fire Release]] user attacks the enemy from one side and a [[Water Release]] user attacks them from the other. The collision of these two naturally opposing natures create a devastating attack as well as a great deal of water vapour.

[[pl:Nōen Jōkiryū no Jutsu]]
